item.title: Super quick start guide to fluidinfo
item.description: This is a quick and dirty guide to getting started with fish, the command line tool for fulidinfo. I did it by setting up a virtualenv, as I find it a lot easier to manage python dependancies that way. Setup a virtualenv: % mkvirtual env fi Open the virtual env session: % workon fi Install httplib2: % pip install httplib2 Install readline: % pip install readline Get fish, you can either get it from github and install from source, last time I checked that was:
